<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request A Multiple Sections">8c2881f3836d221016455a55eeaad360</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>AddOnClick</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    var ga = new GlideAjax('GetStepHtml');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getStepHtml');
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
        g_form.setValue('step_html', response);
        g_form.setValue('current_step', '1'); // 默认 Step1

        // 使用轮询等待 HTML 渲染完
        var retryCount = 0;
        var interval = setInterval(function () {
            var buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.step-button');

            if (buttons.length > 0 || retryCount > 10) {
                clearInterval(interval);

                if (buttons.length === 0) {
                    console.warn('步骤导航未渲染成功，无法绑定事件');
                    return;
                }

                buttons.forEach(function(btn) {
                    btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        var stepNum = btn.getAttribute('data-step');
                        g_form.setValue('current_step', stepNum);

                        // 更新高亮样式
                        buttons.forEach(function(b) {
                            b.style.background = 'white';
                            b.style.color = 'black';
                        });
                        btn.style.background = '#1E40AF';
                        btn.style.color = 'white';
                    });
                });

                // 初始化 Step1 高亮
                var first = document.getElementById('step-1');
                if (first) {
                    first.style.background = '#1E40AF';
                    first.style.color = 'white';
                }

            } else {
                retryCount++;
            }
        }, 300); // 每 300ms 检查一次，最多检查 10 次
    });
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-24 13:54:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>30cceb4883bda21016455a55eeaad359</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AddOnClick</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CatalogItem2Demo" source="x_1758036_catalogi">b6ea743b83e9221016455a55eeaad30b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CatalogItem2Demo">b6ea743b83e9221016455a55eeaad30b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_30cceb4883bda21016455a55eeaad359</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-24 17:05:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
